text:
We had a table of four from our side. Iâ€™d like to share a few comments. Firstly, the restaurant seemed understaffed, as the service was noticeably slow and inefficient. Secondly, one of us ordered the salmon spaghetti, which turned out to be extremely disappointing â€” easily one of the worst salmon dishes weâ€™ve ever had, which is surprising given itâ€™s usually a safe option.

The handling of the situation was also poor. The manager simply replaced the dish without offering any apology, and unfortunately, the second serving was just as bad. The rest of the meals â€” mainly grilled chicken sets â€” were acceptable.

As we were leaving, I raised the concern with an elderly staff member about the food quality, but her response lacked any sense of apology or acknowledgment. The manager remained silent throughout. The salmon tasted and smelled unpleasant â€” almost like it had been washed in dirty water, with a sewer-like odor.

Please take this as constructive feedback: avoid serving salmon dishes in their current state, and improve service standards â€” especially since youâ€™re located in Changi, a place that should reflect the high standards of Singapore.

Food was superb, we cleaned our plates (which was unusual ðŸ˜†). Iâ€™ve been to many Andes outlets before but this outlet has the best atmosphere (not that the rest was bad). Staff was friendly and helpful.

Pls order the wagyu steak if you come here. Love it! Ice lemon tea is just nice, not too sweet and does not taste artificial.

Place is beautiful and Food are even better,but above all the service from the staff is tip Top especially by Mr Zamri ...
I wanted to give him a personal tips (in secret) but he politely rejected me and I tell him it's for him and it's a secret but he is so honest and refused...(Even though I gave him in secret gesture) WOW
Anyway this is my second visit here and we love this place.

Thank you so much Andes and team and Thank you so much Mr Zamri.

I recently visited Andes Terminal 4, and it was a pretty solid choice. The food was tasty and definitely worth the price. The vibe was relaxed, which made it a great spot to hang out. Plus, the staff was super friendly and made sure we were good the whole time. Definitely a place Iâ€™d go back to!
Came here today with my family. Food was good. The seating area extends to outside which is able to host large group of people during peak hour. Good service as well. Food was served fast. Thanks
